high_descs: Look down at the trash can in the corner.
Pick up the disc from the trash can.
Take the disc and turn left, then left again to find the dresser.
Hold the disc and turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Hold a disc and turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Head forward to the golden trash can sitting in the right corner of the room
Pick up the CD that is in the trash can
Turn left and head forward, then take a left at the entry way to the room to face the side of the desk
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine a CD by the light of a lamp

high_descs: Move forward facing the gold trash can on the floor
Pick up the CD sitting inside of the trash can
Turn around and carry the CD to the wood end table where the lamp is sitting
anns.task_desc: Carry a CD while turning on a lamp
